title: PermissionsEx报错问题！
author: 漠然丶淡然
txt_content:
[13:30:24 ERROR]: Could not load 'plugins/PermissionsEx-1.23.3 (1).jar' in folder 'plugins'
org.bukkit.plugin.InvalidDescriptionException: Invalid plugin.yml
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.getPluginDescription(JavaPluginLoader.java:156) ~[x1-Torch-1.9.4-R2.0-Light-RELEASE.jar:git-TacoSpigot-unknown]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.loadPlugins(SimplePluginManager.java:136) [x1-Torch-1.9.4-R2.0-Light-RELEASE.jar:git-TacoSpigot-unknown]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_9_R2.CraftServer.loadPlugins(CraftServer.java:287) [x1-Torch-1.9.4-R2.0-Light-RELEASE.jar:git-TacoSpigot-unknown]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:207) [x1-Torch-1.9.4-R2.0-Light-RELEASE.jar:git-TacoSpigot-unknown]

Caused by: java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file

        at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:219) ~[?:1.8.0_102]

        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.getPluginDescription(JavaPluginLoader.java:144) ~[x1-Torch-1.9.4-R2.0-Light-RELEASE.jar:git-TacoSpigot-unknown]
        ... 5 more复制代码

用着好好的 一重启的报错 sp1.8.8 是这样换成1.9.4也是这样

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content: 无法识别插件的plugin.yml，请尝试重新安装这个插件。另外如果插件有自动更新的功能，最好关掉，因为有可能是更新失败导致的。

replies.author: qq200877776
replies.txt_content:
